Package glitch.api.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExceptionHandler
    Handling your own exception into loggers or own Alerts
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GlitchHttpClient
    The HTTP Client provided for AbstractHttpService
    GlitchHttpClient.Builder  
    HttpRequest<T>
    HTTP Request created by {@link GlitchHttpClient#create(HttpMethod, String, Class)}.
    HttpResponse<R>
    HTTP Response Exchanged via HttpRequest Response Body can be composed using HttpResponse.toMono() or HttpResponse.toFlux(Function).
    HttpResponse.Status
    Response Status POJO
